name: Play Football Journey to World - A fantasy football league, challenge the world top football teams and play real soccer match to be a legend
name_original: Play Football Journey to World - A fantasy football league, challenge the world top football teams and play real soccer match to be a legend
description:
Play Football - Journey to World 2014 is the newest real football game, with improved and real football play simulation, amazing soccer 3D visuals and immersive sound effects.

--------------
Game Features
--------------

- Play Football Journey to Cup include 2 different modes.
- Quick mode in which you play with two random teams.
- Journey mode in which you play with all 32 team that took part in the 2014 cup. Start with rookie
team.
- Compete with friends and beat the highest scores to be a legend.
- Smoother and more realistic and optimized graphics for both players and perfect football stadiums.
- Cool and immersive 3D sounds.
- Smooth animations with 60 frames per second.
- Consume less memory and battery. Unlike other games require quite large storage(more than 1G) and high device capabilities, our Play football Journey to World 2014 is a light
and quite play game (only 40MB).
- Simple yet powerful touch controls.
"Pass button" for pass and tackle ,
"Kick button" for shoot the football.
"Sprint button" to make the player move fast
"Snatch button" that will snatch the ball to you in a second.
- Some of the included teams are Japan football, Spain football, German football, Italy football, USA football,
Indonesia football, Uruguay football, Argentina football, Brazil football, France football, Portugal football
and England football team. The game is more fan than other football tournaments like l English premier
league , European League, Barclay's League, Spanish League.
- A fantasy football league, challenge the world top football teams and play real soccer match to be a legend

The realistic graphics and sound effect for football player, football field, stadiums will make the football match come to life and it's just like watching real soccer tv, football live.  Now you are the football manager and begin to lead your winning eleven players, to take part in the most immersive free football 3D simulation and show that you are the best football coach hero on the pitch. Lead your team to win the championship journey and realize your soccer stars dream!

----------
Be Social
----------

To keep yourself update about new features and games join our social pages.
 - https://www.facebook.com/footccer
 - https://twitter.com/footccer

----------
Feedback
----------

If you have any suggested features or improvements please leave a comment, or send us an email at techmowo@gmail.com. In case something is not working correctly please let us know, I'll be glad to fix that. Please post comments and feedback. When posting low rating please describe what is wrong to give the possibility to fix that issue.
